title: 280: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 7 (More Greg + Will Michael be the Bachelor? + Andrew Confused Us)
itunes:title: 280: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 7 (More Greg + Will Michael be the Bachelor? + Andrew Confused Us)
description:
The Broads are breaking down the final episode before Hometowns! They chat that Greg one-on-one and some of their theories, Brendan's (whomst) exit, that art date, Michael A being full of surprises, Justin’s butterflies, Blake is still their favorite (surprise!), Cuddle Queen Jean, Andrew’s very confusing “goodbye” and much more!

GET TICKETS TO THE LIVE ONLINE SHOW HERE: https://app.loopedlive.com/c/3679

VOTE FOR US FOR PEOPLE’S CHOICE PODCAST AWARDS!Vote here for “Best Comedy Podcast” + “Best Female Hosted Podcast”: https://www.podcastawards.com/
